monogr.author: Lucifer Calaritanus
monogr.title: De non conveniendo cum haereticis
De regibus apostaticis
De sancto Athanasio
De non parcendo in deum delinquentibus
Moriendum esse pro dei filio
Epistulae

encodingDesc.p: The following text is encoded in accordance with EpiDoc standards and with the CTS/CITE Architecture.
